title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The bug report is about the display property of an item not taking effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter
EB: Expected behavior: the item, specifically a label, should disappear from the preview in the PDF.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of a label item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the label is still visible when it should be hidden.
